channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2023110621
item.description:
Report X-2023110621

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-31
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. came to QA wet and when relabeled and repacked QA noticed inner cartons had limited QTY lables and when SDS was pulled the transportation phase was corrosive, so pck was placed in hazmat cage to get inspected. DescribePack: Closure came loose and liquid leaked out of inner bottle and soiled some of the boxes of gloves inside carton. DurationRel: 7 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed in hazmat cage in a lined tote to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023101428
item.description:
Report X-2023101428

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-19
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: No hazmat papers or hazmat service code. Soft plastic jars in corrugated carton. Carton tore and lid came loose on one jar, spilling contents. One jar upside down in carton upon arrival in QA. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in corrugated carton. Loose cap came off one jug, allowing spillage which soiled other jug and damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023101410

Report X-2023101410

  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in corrugated inner cartons and gloves in fiberboard cartons in corrugated outer carton with paper filler. No hazard markings or arrows on exterior. Loose cap on one jug allowed spillage which damaged cartons. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023101369
item.description:
Report X-2023101369

  • City: HENDERSON

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to trailer 821010 on door 201 and pkg. was in trailer leaking and seen it leaked on 2 other hazardous pkgs. trk# 706192395569 and 785129230752 placed these all inside totes and took to hazmat cage to get inspected DescribePack: Closure came loose on bottle and the liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and other pkgs. as well. DurationRel: 19 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

QA saw it was a Hazmat package so they stated the process on it DescribePack: the caps fail on the package DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the package was took out of the van and put in a bag and bucket and token to QA

item.title: Report X-2023101288
item.description:
Report X-2023101288

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic liner bag in plastic pail. Shipped under wrong service code and without hazmat shipping papers. Pail cracked at edge of side and base and liner bag tore, spilling contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023101121
item.description:
Report X-2023101121

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: the package was been unleaded when they noticed the box was wet so they brought the package to QA so QA can inspect the package. QA noticed it was hazmat so we open the package and saw the damaged and start the process on it. DescribePack: it failed by the way they packed the liquids. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was out in a bag and bucket and brought to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023101103
item.description:
Report X-2023101103

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived to station wet because of internal leakage. Package discovered during unloading from trailer. Package put into plastic bag and tote. Only one package effect from spillage, package also bagged in plastic and put into tote. DescribePack: Loose cap on bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package handler discovered leak package and informed unload manager. Manager informs QA and uses gloves to bag packages and put into totes. QA searches for SDS and cleans up spillage according to SDS. All contaminated material put into tote with damaged contents.

item.title: Report X-2023101096
item.description:
Report X-2023101096

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was dropped off of the IC belt near the split. Package was immediately righted, placed into a damage tote with liner, and brought to QA for inspection. Upon inspection contents were found with cracked lid. DescribePack: Crack in lid is about 2-3 inches long and spans from the bottom to the top of the side of the cap, not allowing for secure tightening. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was righted and placed into a damage tote with liner.

item.title: Report X-2023101075
item.description:
Report X-2023101075

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Jerrican was dropped while in the process of unloading. The unload manager called for an Admin to contain the shipment and perform the in-house cleanup. DescribePack: The crack is located on the body of the jerrican and is very small in size. The camera quality of the FZ-N1 scanner couldn't really capture the crack. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: An Admin took PPE and a hazardous materials bag and hazardous materials spill tote to the unload upon the spill being called out over the radio.

item.title: Report X-2023101064
item.description:
Report X-2023101064

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived to station wet because of internal leakage. Package discovered during unloading from trailer. Package bagged in plastic and put into tote. DescribePack: Loose cap on can. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package handler discovered leaking package informed unload manger and contained package in plastic bag. Unload manger informs QA about spillage. QA searched for SDS and used gloves to clean up spillage. Contents absorbed into outer container, no other package effected. Package put into tote with contaminated material used for clean up.
